official_title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress that Dr. Frank G. Burke is recognized for his faithful service to the National Archives of the United States of America.

summary.text: Recognizes and expresses the gratitude of the Congress to Dr. Frank G. Burke for his service to the National Archives.
